message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm offering it to you for $120.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and I'm willing to work with you. How about we split the difference and go with $105? This way we both get a good deal. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $85?
